Silurus.text: Weather very fine, shall expect you this evening

Silva.text: Weather very fine, shall start to-day

Silvesco.text: Weather very fine, will wait your arrival

Silvicola.text: When did you last hear from ---

Similago.text: Writing to you by to-day's post

Similis.text: Writing to you by early post

Simplex.text: Writing to you by next mail ---

Singulus.text: Is anything wrong, have received nothing from ---

Sinister.text: Is anything wrong, have not heard from you

Sinopis.text: Is anything wrong, have not heard from you for some time

Siparium.text: Wrote to you by mail of last ---

Siquandare.text: Wrote to you by this evening's post
